column2: "Na dɔm EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
column5: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Motwe Zion ho nyinkun kɛse
column6: na enyiber kɛse na medze twe no ho nyinkun."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Meresan aba Zion nkyɛn
column3: na mebɛtsena Jerusalɛm mu: na wɔbɛfrɛ Jerusalɛm Nokwar kurow no; na dɔm EWURADZE ne bepɔw no

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Nkɔdaa na mberwa bɛda ho atsenatsena Jerusalɛm abrɔn mu
column4: nyimpa biara bekitsa poma wɔ ne nsamu."

column2: "Na mbanyimbasiaba na nkataasia bɛhyɛ kurow no n’abrɔn no amaama
column3: na woedzi agor wɔ abrɔn no mu."

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Sɛ ɔyɛ ɔman yi ne nkaa no nwanwa wɔ nda no mu a
column3: aso ɔbɛyɛ nwanwa wɔ emi so m’enyi do anaa? Dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: mebɛgye me man nkwa efi boka asaase no do

column2: "na medze hɔn aba
column3: na wɔabɛtsena Jerusalɛm mu; na wɔbɛyɛ me man
column4: na emi so mayɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: hom nhyehyɛ hom nsamu dzen
column3: hom a hom tse nsɛm yi wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo anomu wɔ nda yi mu
column4: hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ da no a wɔtoow dɔm EWURADZE ne fi fapem no

column2: "Na ansaana da no reba no
column3: na apaabɔ ho akatua nnyi hɔ mma nyimpa bi
column4: eso apaabɔ nnyi hɔ mma abowa; eso asomdwee biara nnyi hɔ mma nyia opue anaa nyia ɔba mu osian ɔhohiahiafo no ntsi: na memaa nyimpa nyina obiara nye ne nyɛnko dzii esi."

column2: "Na afei dze mennkɛyɛ dɛ nkan no ama ɔman yi nkaa no
"Na asomdwee aba bɛba hɔ; wenyindua bɔsow n’aba
column4: na sorsor bɔtɔ no bɔsu; na mebɛma ɔman yi ne nkaa no enya ndzɛmba yinom nyina edzi."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛɛ ndom wɔ amanaman mu no
column4: ao Juda fifo na Israel fifo
column6: na hom ayɛ nhyira: mma hom nnsuro
column7: na mbom hom nhyehyɛ hom nsamu dzen."

column2: "Na mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Dɛ mbrɛ modween dɛ mebɛyɛ hom bɔn wɔ ber a hom egyanom yii me ebufuw no na mannsesa m’adwen no;"
"dɛmara so bio na madwen nda yi mu dɛ mebɛyɛ Jerusalɛm na Juda fi yie: mma hom nnsuro."
"Iyinom nye ndzɛmba a hom nyɛ; Hom mu nyimpa biara nkasa nokwar nkyerɛ ne nyɛnko; hom mbua nokwar na asomdwee atsɛn wɔ hom mbobokɛse mu:"
"na mma hom mu obiara nndwen n’akoma mu bɔn wɔ ne nyɛnko ho; na mma hom mmpɛ ator ntanka: na iyinom nyina yɛ ndzɛmba a mikyir
"Na dɔm EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
column5: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Bosoom a otsia anan
column6: enum esuon na du no mu akɔnkyen no
column8: na ahotɔ afahyɛ ama Juda fi; dɛm ntsi hom ndɔ nokwar na asomdwee."

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Ɔbɛba no dɛmara
column4: na nkurow pii mu atsefo bɛba:"

column2: "na kurow kor mu atsefo bɔkɔ kor so mu akɛse dɛ
column3: Hom mma yɛnkɔ ntsɛmara nkɔtotɔ nserɛ EWURADZE n’enyimpa
column4: na yɛnhwehwɛ dɔm EWURADZE n’ekyir kwan: na mara so morokɔ."

column2: "Nyew
column3: aman pii na amanaman a wɔyɛ dzen bɛba abɔhwehwɛ dɔm EWURADZE n’ekyir kwan wɔ Jerusalɛm

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Nda no mu na ɔbɛba dɛ mbanyin du a wofi amanaman kasaa nyina mu bosusuo Jewnyi baako n’atar ano
column5: osiandɛ yɛatse dɛ Nyankopɔn nye hom wɔ hɔ."
